recipe.title: Fish Tacos
recipe.description: Crispy fish with fresh slaw in soft tortillas

steps.descr: Mix flour with paprika, salt, and pepper
steps.instructions: Mix flour with paprika, salt, and pepper

on_enter.say: Right, let's mix the flour with paprika, a pinch of salt, and a dash of pepper. This is going to give our fish a lovely flavour.

steps.descr: Cut fish into strips, coat in flour
steps.instructions: Cut fish into strips, coat in flour

on_enter.say: Now, let's cut the fish into nice strips and give them a good coating in our seasoned flour. Make sure they're well covered.

steps.descr: Fry in hot oil until golden and crispy
steps.instructions: Fry in hot oil until golden and crispy

on_enter.say: Time to fry the fish! Get your oil nice and hot, then fry those strips until they're golden and crispy. You'll know it's ready when you hear that lovely sizzle.

steps.descr: Mix cabbage with mayo and lime juice for slaw
steps.instructions: Mix cabbage with mayo and lime juice for slaw

on_enter.say: Let's whip up the slaw. Mix the shredded cabbage with mayonnaise and a good squeeze of lime juice. It should be creamy and zesty.
Let's warm up those tortillas until they're nice and soft. A quick toast on a hot pan will do the trick.
Now for the fun part! Let's fill those warm tortillas with our crispy fish and fresh slaw. It's going to be delicious.

steps.descr: Top with cilantro and extra lime
steps.instructions: Top with cilantro and extra lime

on_enter.say: Finally, let's top it off with some fresh cilantro and an extra squeeze of lime. Perfect! You're going to love this.

notes.text:
Cod or tilapia work great
Add hot sauce for extra kick
Serve with fresh pico de gallo
